Text: Re Enrons Response to IRF SolicitationIm working with the California Resturant Association on a member program Their Government Affairs Person Jot Condi has asked for our help Would you review his concern and let me know what steps if any we can take Feel free to contact Jot directly at Forwarded by Lyle WhiteHOUEES on AM Pete White on AM To cc Subject Re Enrons Response to IRF Solicitation Lyle Thanks for the quick response Please send your Terms and Conditions to my attention Peter White Director of Materials International Rectifier El Segundo Facility Kansas St El Segundo Ca Lyle White AM Forwarded by Lyle WhiteHOUEES on AM Lyle White AM To cc Subject Enrons Response to IRF Solicitation I received your letter to discuss options with Enron Based on latest developments it will be important to discuss options as soon as possible If Senate Bill X does not pass or it compromises to favor only accounts under kW then there is a short window of opportunity to commit to direct access before AB x is enacted I will have a contract for review in the next few days but in the meantime please feel free to call me at the following Lyle White Enron Energy Services office cell
